update fuwufangan
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
household_property = #{householdProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
social_security_type = #{socialSecurityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
implement_date = #{implementDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
social_security_min_base = #{socialSecurityMinBase,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pension_company_pay = #{pensionCompanyPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pension_person_pay = #{pensionPersonPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
medical_company_pay = #{medicalCompanyPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
medical_person_pay = #{medicalPersonPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
unemployment_company_pay = #{unemploymentCompanyPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
unemployment_person_pay = #{unemploymentPersonPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
serious_illness_company_pay = #{seriousIllnessCompanyPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
serious_illness_person_pay = #{seriousIllnessPersonPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
procreate_company_pay = #{procreateCompanyPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

accumulation_fund_person_pay = #{accumulationFundPersonPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

other_person_pay = #{otherPersonPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
service_charge = #{serviceCharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
disability_guarantee_fund = #{disabilityGuaranteeFund,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where fw_id = #{fwId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fuwufangan set type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, household_property = #{householdProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, social_security_type = #{socialSecurityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, implement_date = #{implementDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, social_security_min_base = #{socialSecurityMinBase,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pension_company_pay = #{pensionCompanyPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pension_person_pay = #{pensionPersonPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, medical_company_pay = #{medicalCompanyPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, medical_person_pay = #{medicalPersonPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, unemployment_company_pay = #{unemploymentCompanyPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, unemployment_person_pay = #{unemploymentPersonPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, serious_illness_company_pay = #{seriousIllnessCompanyPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, serious_illness_person_pay = #{seriousIllnessPersonPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, procreate_company_pay = #{procreateCompanyPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, injury_company_pay = #{injuryCompanyPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, accumulation_fund_company_pay = #{accumulationFundCompanyPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, accumulation_fund_person_pay = #{accumulationFundPersonPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, other_company_pay = #{otherCompanyPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, other_person_pay = #{otherPersonPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, service_charge = #{serviceCharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, disability_guarantee_fund = #{disabilityGuaranteeFund,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where fw_id = #{fwId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select fw.fw_id, s.supplier_name, c.customer_name, fw.city_id, fw.product_name, fw.household_property, fw.social_security_type, fw.implement_date, fw.social_security_min_base, fw.pension_company_pay, fw.pension_person_pay, fw.medical_company_pay, fw.medical_person_pay, fw.unemployment_company_pay, fw.unemployment_person_pay, fw.serious_illness_company_pay, fw.serious_illness_person_pay, fw.procreate_company_pay,fw.other_company_pay, fw.other_person_pay, fw.injury_company_pay, fw.service_charge, fw.disability_guarantee_fund, fw.version from fuwufangan fw,customer c,supplier s where fw.supplier_id = s.s_id and fw.customer_id = c.c_id and fw.city_id like #{city}

select fw.fw_id, fw.supplier_id, s.supplier_name, fw.customer_id, c.customer_name, fw.city_id city, fw.product_name, fw.household_property, fw.social_security_type from fuwufangan fw,supplier s,customer c where fw.supplier_id = s.s_id and fw.customer_id = c.c_id and fw.supplier_id in(select s_id from supplier where user_id = #{userId} or user_id is NULL)
